meanings.sent1: The team is founding a new club in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: She is founding a company to sell handmade jewelry.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel founding a nut storage business was quite a sight.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for baking was the founding force behind her successful bakery.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's dedication to education was the founding principle of the school.

meanings.definition: The act of creating or setting up something
meanings.sent1: The founding of the company brought new job opportunities.
meanings.sent2: Learning about the founding of the city was fascinating.
meanings.sent3: The founding of the ice cream shop made everyone scream for joy.
meanings.sent4: The founding of the library was like planting seeds of knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The founding of the club marked the beginning of many friendships.

meanings.definition: The base or groundwork of something
meanings.sent1: The founding of the house was solid and well-built.
meanings.sent2: Understanding history helps us appreciate the founding of our nation.
meanings.sent3: The founding of the cake was the most delicious part.
meanings.sent4: Friendship is the founding of a strong support system.
meanings.sent5: The founding of the tree's roots ensured its stability in the storm.
